"',verse: 789,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: 'Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."',verse: 790,},ayah_16: {image: '',text: 'He from whom it is averted that Day -  [ Allah ] has granted him mercy. So were you to send them away, you would [then] be of the wrongdoers.',verse: 827,},ayah_53: {image: '',text: 'And thus We have tried some of them through others that the disbelievers might say, "Is it these whom Allah has favored among us?"
